name: paramtuner
description: easily parameter tuning in your code!

scripts.start: coffee -bj tuner.js -c src/tuner.coffee && coffee -bj lib/configerror.js -c src/lib/configerror.coffee && coffee -bj lib/tuningwatcher.js -c src/lib/tuningwatcher.coffee && coffee -bj lib/strategy.js -c src/lib/strategy.coffee

author: Muddy Dixon muddydixon@gmail.com
